# Qu. 5 ----

```{r}
qu5_function <- function(x){
  
  if (is.character(x) == T){
    str_c("The answer is: ", x)
    }
    else {
      if ((x <= 10) == TRUE){
      str_c("The answer is: ", x)
      } 
      else {
        if ((x > 10) == TRUE){
          str_c("The answer is: ", x / 10)
          }
        }
    }
}
```

```{r}
# pass x as a character or numeric.

x <- "10"

qu5_function(x)
```

# Qu. 6 ----

```{r}
qu6_function <- function(x, y){
  
  if (identical(x, y) == T){
    print("Exactly the same")
    } 
    else {
      if (setequal(x, y) == T){
      print("The same") 
      } 
        else {
          if (setequal(x, y) == F){
          print("Different")
          }
    }
  }
}
```

```{r}
x <- c(1, 9, 2)
y <- c(1, 2, 9)

qu6_function(x, y)
```

times_table <- function(x){

    print(str_c(x, " x ", i, " = ", x * i))
  }
}
